title: Drawing, "Ceiling and Four Walls of a Room", 1815–22
medium: Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Against a gray background, ceiling at center. Upper wall has center fireplace with mirror above. Right wall has decorated panel, doors to left and right. Lower wall has console center with vases on it, mirror above. Left wall has console center, lamp and vases on it, curtained windows either side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ceiling and Four Walls of a Room", 1815–22.
1815–22. Graphite, pen and black ink, brush and watercolor on wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-125.
